trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"></xref> cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging"> </xref> törölhető az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs class contains information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: A WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs osztály kapcsolatos tudnivalókat tartalmaz a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>esemény.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs> class provides access to the display mode that will be applied to the Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs>osztály a megjelenítési mód a kijelzők vezérlőre alkalmazandó hozzáférést biztosít.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The display mode is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A megjelenítési mód keresztül érhető el a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> to apply to a Web Parts control.
Gets or sets the display mode to apply to a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a megjelenítési mód a kijelzők vezérlőre alkalmazandó.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> to apply to a Web Parts control.
